articles.title: Scientists Race To Defuse a “Ticking” Public Health Time Bomb - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The surge in diseases transmitted by ticks throughout numerous regions of the United States in the past fifty years poses a significant threat to public health, necessitating innovative solutions, caution a team of scientists from Yale. In a review article, t…
articles.content:
ByYale UniversityOctober 20, 2023
Over the past five decades, the U.S. has seen a dramatic rise in tick-borne diseases, prompting urgent calls for innovative solutions from scientists at Yale. Their… [+6783 chars]
